import React, { useState } from 'react' import CompanyLogo from '../icons/company-logo' import useButtonAction from '../../hooks/useButtonAction' import './index.css' const Nav = () => { const { handleStartHiring, handleNavigation, handleHome } = useButtonAction(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); return ( <> {/* Original design for screens >= 768px */}
handleNavigation('how-it-works')} > How it works handleNavigation('pricing')} > Pricing handleNavigation('roles')} > Roles handleNavigation('our-promise')} > Our promise
) } export default Nav;
